Tolkien-related events that took place in 1997.

content.title: January
content.content: 6 - A new edition of The Monsters and the Critics is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
25 - Tyalie Tyelellieva issue 10 is published.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 38 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
1 - The German Tolkien Society Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft e.V. is founded.
8-11 - Mythcon 28.
18 - The audiobook Pearl and Sir Orfeo by J.R.R. Tolkien, read by Terry Jones, is published.
? - Production begins for The Lord of the Rings (film series).

content.title: September
content.content:
19-21 - Oxonmoot 1997.
30 - The album An Evening in Rivendell is released.
? - The Hobbit audiobook topped the bestseller list for audiobooks for children.
? - Mallorn 35 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
20 - Actor John Bell is born.
24 - Don Messick, who voiced Balin and the Lord of the Eagles in The Hobbit (1977 film), dies.

content.title: November
content.content:
13 - Peter Jackson sends a parcel containing "Forgotten Silver" and "Heavenly Creatures", and a letter explaining an upcoming movie project to Alan Lee.
13 - The Brazilian Tolkien Society is founded.

? - Tales from the Perilous Realm is published.
? - A Question of Time is published.

? - The Hobbit (1968 radio series) is released on CD.
? - The Hobbit Companion is published.
? - Artist Maret Kernumees dies.
? - The Middle-earth Puzzles are released.
? - Middle-earth: The Lidless Eye card game is released.
? - Middle-earth: Against the Shadow card game is released.
? - Middle-earth: The White Hand card game is released.
? - Hands of the Healer is published.
